header.title: Dramatic spike in anti-Semitic incidents in US
header.subtitle: NA
header.postText: The Anti-Defamation League, an organization that tracks anti-Semitism around the country, says incidents against Jewish people rose dramatically following the 2016 election. CNN's Sara Sidner takes a look at several incidents over the past year. #CNN #News
